propertiesGroup.description: Base configuration properties that are used by ldap authentication provider.

property.name: keyFileLocation
property.description: The path to the secret keystore.

property.name: keyPassword
property.description: Password used to protect the secret key in the keystore.

property.name: algorithm
property.description: Algorithm to use for encrypting data. This is a transformation string of the format accepted by the javax.crypto.Cipher#getInstance method. The default is 'AES'.

property.name: trustFileLocation
property.description: The path to the secret truststore.

property.name: trustPassword
property.description: Password used to protect the secret key in the truststore.

property.name: clientKeyFileLocation
property.description: The path to the secret keystore.

property.name: clientKeyPassword
property.description: Password used to protect the secret key in the keystore.

property.name: clientTrustFileLocation
property.description: The path to the secret truststore.

property.name: clientTrustPassword
property.description: Password used to protect the secret key in the truststore.
